Divine Will.quote: "Not my will, but Yours be done." (Luke 22:42)

Divine Grace.quote: "By grace you have been saved through faith." (Ephesians 2:8)

Divine Justice.quote: "Righteousness and justice are the foundation of Your throne." (Psalm 89:14)

Divine Mercy.quote: "Allah is the Most Merciful of the merciful." (Quran 12:92)

Divine Protection.quote: "The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer." (Psalm 18:2)

Divine Healing.quote: "I am the Lord, who heals you." (Exodus 15:26)

Divine Illumination.quote: "I am the light of the world." (John 8:12)

Divine Liberation.quote: "Know the truth, and the truth will set you free." (John 8:32)

Divine Wisdom.quote: "The Lord gives wisdom; from his mouth come knowledge and understanding." (Proverbs 2:6)

Divine Love.quote: "Nothing can separate us from the love of God." (Romans 8:38-39)

Divine Authority.quote: "All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me." (Matthew 28:18)

Divine Providence.quote: "In all things God works for the good of those who love him." (Romans 8:28)

Divine Guidance.quote: "Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path." (Psalm 119:105)

Divine Order.quote: "God is not a God of disorder but of peace." (1 Corinthians 14:33)

Divine Judgment.quote: "The Father has given all judgment to the Son." (John 5:22)

Divine Victory.quote: "Thanks be to God, who gives us the victory." (1 Corinthians 15:57)

Divine Peace.quote: "Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you." (John 14:27)

Divine Unity.quote: "That they all may be one, as You, Father, are in Me, and I in You." (John 17:21)

Divine Resurrection.quote: "I am the resurrection and the life." (John 11:25)

Divine Purification.quote: "Create in me a clean heart, O God." (Psalm 51:10)

Divine Sovereignty.quote: "The Lord has established His throne in heaven, and His kingdom rules over all." (Psalm 103:19)

Divine Perfection.quote: "Be perfect, therefore, as your heavenly Father is perfect." (Matthew 5:48)

Creation.quote: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth. (Genesis 1:1)

Omnipotence.quote: With God all things are possible. (Matthew 19:26)

Omnipresence.quote: Where can I go from your Spirit? Where can I flee from your presence? (Psalm 139:7)

Transcendence.quote: My thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways, declares the Lord. (Isaiah 55:8)

Immanence.quote: The Kingdom of God is within you. (Luke 17:21)

Justice.quote: The Lord is a God of justice. (Isaiah 30:18)

Judgment.quote: He will judge the world in righteousness. (Acts 17:31)

Miracles.quote: Jesus did many other miraculous signs in the presence of his disciples, which are not recorded in this book. (John 20:30)

Healing.quote: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds. (Psalm 147:3)

Revelation.quote: The secret things belong to the Lord our God, but the things revealed belong to us and to our children forever. (Deuteronomy 29:29)

Inspiration.quote: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness. (2 Timothy 3:16)

Transformation.quote: Be transformed by the renewing of your mind. (Romans 12:2)

Redemption.quote: In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins. (Ephesians 1:7)

Salvation.quote: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life. (John 3:16)

Forgiveness.quote: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness. (1 John 1:9)

Providence.quote: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose. (Romans 8:28)

Sustenance.quote: He gives food to every creature. (Psalm 136:25)

Guidance.quote: Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight. (Proverbs 3:5-6)

Wisdom.quote: If any of you lacks wisdom, you should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to you. (James 1:5)

Blessing.quote: "The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you; the Lord turn his face toward you and give you peace." (Numbers 6:24-26)
